subject: Productivity
title: The Extinction Burst
description: A quick win: understand The Extinction Burst.

hook.text: You stop checking social media. On day three the urge hits harder than ever. That's normal.

buildup.text: An extinction burst is a temporary spike in the old behavior when you first stop rewarding it.

discovery.text: BF Skinner documented this in labs. Remove the reward and behavior intensifies before it fades.

twist.text: Most people quit during the burst, thinking the method failed. The spike means it's actually working.

climax.text: Push through the burst and the old habit weakens. Give in and the loop only grows stronger.

punchline.text: The worst urge comes right before the breakthrough.

quiz.question: What is an extinction burst?
options: A temporary spike in old behavior when the reward is removed
A permanent increase in bad habits
The moment a habit disappears completely
